ygData.subject: Re: Minotaur Ribcage
ygData.msgSnippet: You should send a the information and a screen shot of the item to the EQlizer.  I ve never heard of it... Good to know they keep adding more magic items. ...
ygData.messageBody:
You should send a the information and a screen shot of the item to the
EQlizer. I've never heard of it... Good to know they keep adding more magic
items.


>From: "CybrWzrd" <CybrWzrd@...>
>Reply-To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
>To: <eqpaladin@onelist.com>
>Subject: [eqpaladin] Minotaur Ribcage
>Date: Sun, 13 Jun 1999 05:16:44 -0500
>
>I was adventuring in The gorge, and this little flying deamon attacked me,
>I freaked out at first, and then conned it, it was risky. Its name was Yymp
>the Infernal. We battled, and I successfull slew the beast. When looting I
>was suprised when I found a (I imagine) a very valueable piece of armor, a
>Minoutar Ribcage 16ac 5str 5 stm -9 cha. Nice stats i thought. I being a
>high elf cannot use this piece of equipment, human euridite and half elf
>only, bleah but I am going to keep it for a new character i think. So all
>of you who can use it, i would reccommend watching out for it, I imagine it
>is a very rare find.
>
>Lady Dame Laurana Highwind
>Paladin of the 21st rank
>Allied Explorers Of Norrath
>The Rathe
>List Moderator
>
